entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
